tutorial.text: Run away from Tom and collect as much cheese as you can.
At the top you can see how much cheese you have already collected.
tutorial.label: pointCheese

tutorial.text: Use the arrow keys to move left and right.
tutorial.textMobile: Swipe left and right to run.
tutorial.label: leftright

tutorial.text: Jump up or duck to avoid obstacles.
tutorial.textMobile: Swipe up or down to jump or duck.
tutorial.label: updown

tutorial.text: Use the slow motion to slow down and collect more cheese.
tutorial.label: pointTime

tutorial.text: Collect the magnet to collect more cheese.
tutorial.label: labelMagnet
